ing.item: Pureed fruit (try cherries; raspberries; canned pineapple; honeydew or cantaloupe melon; or citrus fruit)

directions.step:
Date: Thu, 23 May 1996 23:21:04 -0400
From: KimAllen@aol.com From the booklet that accompanied my Supremer Ice Creamer from NordicWare.
Mix egg whites and sugar with wire whist. Blend in fruit and water. Mix well. Chill. Pour into ice cream maker and follow directions for ice cream.
